definition: to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor

sentences.english: I'm anxious to go back home as I've been away for a very long time.
sentences.chinese: 我已经好久没有回家了，此刻真是归心似箭。

sentences.english: The result verified the meridian distribution of Borneol in TCM theory.
sentences.chinese: 结果证实了中医中冰片归心经的论述。

sentences.english: Those who let Yao Ming impatient to get back is in Houston's wife.
sentences.chinese: 让姚明归心似箭的还是在休斯敦的妻子。

sentences.english: The lost child is impatient to come back.
Listen evening cicada sitting alone near the water, ten years Linhe resistance's hearts.
sentences.chinese: 独听暮蝉临水坐，十年林壑阻归心。

sentences.english: This is our first batch of badges design.
sentences.chinese: 这是《归心如飞》的第一批徽章。
